article_title: Pekin Hospital CEO: Hospital meeting goals, new physicians’ center coming

article_metadata.description:
Pekin Hospital CEO Bob Haley says four of the hospital’s 10-point strategic plan items have been completed in the past year and progress has been made on the remaining points.
The hospital started construction of a new $1.1 million surgical waiting room in early April that will be 3,500 square feet and located atop the Women’s Diagnostic Center and admissions department. It will open in October.
That will not be the only expansion this year, said Haley. Over the past few years, the
article_metadata.author: Sharon Woods Harris Pekin Daily Times reporter sharris@pekintimes.com
